summary: In 1960s China, French diplomat Rene Gallimard falls in love with an opera singer, Song Liling - but Song is not at all who Gallimard thinks.
cast: Jeremy Irons|John Lone|Barbara Sukowa|Ian Richardson|Annabel Leventon|Shizuko Hoshi|Richard McMillan|Vernon Dobtcheff|David Hemblen|Damir Andrei|Antony Parr|Margaret Ma|Tristram Jellinek|Philip McGough|David Neal|Sean Hewitt|Peter Messaline|Michael Mehlmann|Barbara Chilcott|George Jonas|Carl Zvonkin|Viktor Fülöp|Cadman Chui|The Beijing Opera Troupe|María Teresa Uribe|Harriet Chung|Monica Gan|Ayumi Komoda|Tammy Lok|Tracey Oh|Carly Wong
title: M. Butterfly
